original_text: The names of Gad's descendants were written down at the time when Jotham was king of Judah and Jeroboam was king of Israel.
korean_text: 이상은 유다 왕 요담 때와 이스라엘 왕 여로보암 때에 족보에 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: The names of Gad's descendants were written down
at the time when Jotham was king of Judah
and Jeroboam was king of Israel
